title: SWE Intern Technical Rubric

dimensions.name: communication
dimensions.description: Clarity, structure, and precision of explanations.

levels.description: Unclear, disorganized, or missing key steps.
Understands basics but explanations have gaps.
Clear, structured explanation with good pacing.
Concise, precise, and easy to follow end-to-end.

dimensions.name: problem_solving
dimensions.description: Ability to frame the problem, plan an approach, and adapt.

levels.description: Struggles to frame the problem or choose an approach.
Finds a workable approach with some guidance.
Solid plan with good decomposition and trade-offs.
Elegant strategy with strong insight and flexibility.

dimensions.name: correctness_reasoning
dimensions.description: Soundness of reasoning, correctness proof, and invariants.

levels.description: Incorrect or lacks reasoning for correctness.
Some reasoning but gaps or unsupported claims.
Clear reasoning with key invariants covered.
Rigorous, complete correctness reasoning.

dimensions.name: complexity
dimensions.description: Accuracy of time/space analysis and optimization awareness.

levels.description: No complexity analysis or clearly incorrect.
Basic analysis but incomplete or slightly off.
Accurate time and space analysis, mentions trade-offs.
Thorough analysis with optimization insight.

dimensions.name: edge_cases
dimensions.description: Identification and handling of edge cases and constraints.

levels.description: Misses key edge cases or constraints.
Mentions some edge cases, incomplete coverage.
Covers major edge cases and constraints.
Comprehensive edge cases and robust handling.

overall_scoring: Compute the overall score as the average of the five dimension scores, scaled to 0-100 and rounded.
